Additional material This book refers to additional material that can be downloaded from the internet. It includes the following topics:  “Locating the web material” on page 490  “Using the web material” on page 490  “z/VM REXX EXECs and XEDIT macros” on page 491  “Sample files” on page 499  “Linux code” on page 500 C 490 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 Locating the web material The web material that is associated with this book is available on the Internet. You can obtain this material at the following URL: http://ibm.com/vm/pubs/redbooks/sg248147 Using the web material The files that are associated with this book are in a GNU compressed tar file.
